nodes.text: The Scout-class 2-M repulsor tank, or simply SC2-M repulsor tank, was a ground-based repulsortank produced by Rothana Heavy Engineering for use by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. It was a scout variant modeled after the 2-M Saber-class. The tank came equipped with a deflector shield generator but sacrificed the heavier firepower of the Saber-class to create space for an additional passenger and added sensor equipment.
